header.title: SQL Query Engine
header.description: This adds an ACP Module for Founders only so that they can execute sql queries on the forums database. Useful for installing MODs and for MOD developers when testing and creating MOD. A simple MOD that requires no file edits. Just 4 uploads and running the UMIF install file.
header.author-notes:
Disclaimer: SA007, Michael C, SA007's Blast Lab, and his/its affiliates/co-developers and technical advisor's do not accept any responsibility for any person that uses the SQL Query Engine and its consequences.
Also this is a dangerous MOD when used improperly. It changes your root database which can cause to corrupted databases, loss of data, etc. We do not recommended you use this MOD unless you are following another MOD's Install instructions or are a developer and know what you are doing. Always make a backup of your database before executing commands on the SQL Engine.
A further note, this is available to use by all founders of your forum install, make sure you trust all the founders of your board before you install this MOD.
Anything that happens as a result of using the SQL Query Engine is in no way our responsibility. However we do ask you submit it to our issue tracker at sa007.cz.cc for further investigation so that we may look into the problem and what caused it.
